entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
